column4: hi, gays. I meet a problem in synaptic:when i open it with non-su,it can search directly,but when with su, it doesn't work. can any one know how fix it.
yes ,i know! to install need root, but in root it can't locate the package when i press key
you mean, when you don't run as root, when you press 's' it jumps to packages that start with s ? It doesn't do that here in either
